reviewtext: I prefer Monster over any other cable brand. How can I get excited about reviewing this product? I use it only as a power strip, since I have a dual-tuner DirecTV/TiVo and a Phillips LCD TV connected via component video. I understood what I was buying though, so I won't ding Monster for the item. It does its job and it does it well, but there are no bells and whistles on this thing.
summary: Hard to review a power strip
